description: This file defines a Pinia store for chat interactions, managing websocket connection, messages, and user actions.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Establishes a websocket connection to a chat room, setting up message handlers and connection state.

methods.name: send
methods.description: Sends a chat message via websocket and updates the local message list.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Closes the websocket connection and updates connection state.

ctags.name: Message
ctags.pattern: /^interface Message { id: string; sender: string; text: string; ts: number }$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^interface Message { id: string; sender: string; text: string; ts: number }$/

ctags.name: sender
ctags.pattern: /^interface Message { id: string; sender: string; text: string; ts: number }$/

ctags.name: text
ctags.pattern: /^interface Message { id: string; sender: string; text: string; ts: number }$/

ctags.name: ts
ctags.pattern: /^interface Message { id: string; sender: string; text: string; ts: number }$/

fields.name: interface Message { id: string; sender: string; text: string; ts: number }
